trans-unit.source: 19 miles (31 kilometers) to the northeast of Wicklow, is Bray, a popular spot for visitors wishing to discover more of the region.
trans-unit.target: 19 miles (31 kilometers) to the northeast of Wicklow, is Bray, a popular spot for visitors wishing to discover more of the region.

trans-unit.source: Coming from Dublin Airport in Wicklow, Bray lies 17 miles (27 kilometers) to the south.
trans-unit.target: Coming from Dublin Airport in Wicklow, Bray lies 17 miles (27 kilometers) to the south.

trans-unit.source: Bray is a great place to base yourself while you are in Wicklow as many of the city most popular attractions are within easy driving distance.
trans-unit.target: Bray is a great place to base yourself while you are in Wicklow as many of the city s most popular attractions are within easy driving distance.
